text: Gregory Eli Pyle (April 25, 1949 â€“ October 26, 2019) was an American politician. He was the Chief of the Choctaw Nation of Oklahoma from 1997 through 2014. He was born in Fort Bragg, California. Pyle was a member of the Democratic Party. Pyle died on October 26, 2019 in Durant, Oklahoma at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from California Category:Politicians from Oklahoma Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Gregory E. Pyle
